buildCheckSatisfiability

public static void buildCheckSatisfiability(TBox t,
                                            boolean verbose,
                                            java.lang.String prefix)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Verifies the satisfiability of the TBox t. If the option verbose is set, the latex files of the intermediate steps are generated. prefix specifies the names of the files.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

                                                   boolean verbose,
                                                   java.lang.String prefix)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
Verifies the satisfiability of the concept c in the tbox t. If the option verbose is set, the latex files of the intermediate steps are generated. prefix specifies the names of the files.

java.lang.Exception
